prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Will my message this morning accelerate or delay the fated union between Stefan and myself?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a methodical list of the relevant chart data, organized by category, drawn from the horary chart you provided. Note that we treat your Ascendant (Melissa) as the questioner and, by the cross‐reference, Stefan is represented by the chart’s 6th house (Jupiter). This list is compiled using strict horary principles.

1. Planetary Positions and House Placements
 • Ascendant (Melissa): 24° Sagittarius (1st house; no planets located here)
 • Sun: 15° Aquarius – placed in the 2nd house (begins at 27° Capricorn)
 • Mercury: 12° Aquarius – in the 2nd house, joining Sun and Pluto
 • Pluto: 2° 09′ Aquarius – in the 2nd house
 • Venus: 0° 03′ Aries – in the 3rd house (starts at 12° Pisces; note its placement in Aries indicates a quickly moving energy)
 • Saturn: 17° 47′ Pisces – in the 3rd house
 • Neptune: 28° 04′ Pisces – in the 3rd house
 • North Node (r): 29° 40′ Pisces – also in the 3rd house
 • Moon: 3° 38′ Taurus – in the 4th house (starting at 18° Aries)
 • Chiron: 19° 36′ Aries – in the 4th house, joining Moon
 • Uranus: 23° 16′ Taurus – in the 5th house (starting at 12° Taurus)
 • Jupiter (representing Stefan by the cross‐reference to the 9th house): 11° 16′ Gemini – in the 6th house (starting at 1° Gemini)
 • Mars (a significator of action, communication, or conflict): 19° 31′ Cancer (retrograde) – in the 7th house (starting at 24° Gemini)

2. Major Aspects (by orb as noted; these are all direct, required for further interpretation):
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb: 0°)
 • MC Opposition IC (orb: 0°)
 • Mars Square IC (orb: 1°)
 • Mars Square MC (orb: 1°)
 • Moon Square Pluto (orb: 1°)
 • Chiron Opposition MC (orb: 1°)
 • Chiron Conjunction IC (orb: 1°)
 • Neptune Conjunction North Node (orb: 1°)
 • Venus Conjunction North Node (orb: 1°)
 • Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb: 1°)
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb: 2°)
 • Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb: 2°)
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 2°)
 • Pluto Sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Sun Sextile IC (orb: 3°)
 • Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb: 3°)
 • Sun Trine MC (orb: 3°)
 • Mars Sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)
 • Sun Sextile Chiron (orb: 4°)
 • Neptune Square Ascendant (orb: 4°)
 • Sun Trine Jupiter (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Chiron Trine Ascendant (orb: 5°)
 • Ascendant Sextile MC (orb: 6°)
 • Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Mercury Sextile IC (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter Square Saturn (orb: 6°)
 • Venus Square Ascendant (orb: 6°)
 • Ascendant Trine IC (orb: 6°)
 • Mercury Trine MC (orb: 6°)
 • Saturn Square Ascendant (orb: 7°)
 • Jupiter Trine MC (orb: 7°)

3. Aspect Patterns of Note
 A. Grand Trine:
  – Sun (15° Aquarius – 2nd house),
  – Mercury (12° Aquarius – 2nd house),
  – Jupiter (11° Gemini – 6th house), and
  – MC (18° Libra – 10th house) form a grand trine; this supports harmonious communication between you and the collective destiny and may indirectly color the union question.
 B. T-Square Formation:
  – Involving MC (18° Libra, 10th house), Mars (19° Cancer, 7th house), and IC (18° Aries, 4th house) with Chiron (19° Aries, 4th house) forming one of its arms. This configuration emphasizes tension that must be managed in the matter of your query.
 C. Multiple Planet Square:
  – Involves Neptune (28° Pisces, 3rd house), Ascendant (24° Sagittarius, 1st house), Saturn (17° Pisces, 3rd house), Jupiter (11° Gemini, 6th house) and Venus (0° Aries, 3rd house). The square between these significators indicates a complex interplay between personal identity, fate, and communication.

4. Special Chart Features
 • The Moon is a waxing crescent, suggesting an opening or initiation of communication or intent.
 • The overall chart is noted as a Bowl shape with dominant air (Mercury, Sun, Pluto) among inner planets, suggesting mental and communicative emphasis.
 • The majority of planets concentrate in the lower right quadrant, while the top left quadrant is notably empty, hinting at an imbalance between external expression and internal receptivity.
 • Chiron and the IC are positioned at the nadir, which may point to issues of deep-seated vulnerability affecting the query.

5. Timing Indicators and Communication Themes
 • Mercury and its aspects (conjunction with the Sun and sextile to the IC) typically denote messaging and communication.
 • Mercury’s trine to Jupiter (in the 6th house, representing Stefan) is especially pertinent, as it links your message to the significator for the fated union.
 • The interplay of Venus (the planet of attraction) in the 3rd house alongside North Node and Neptune suggests that the energies of desire and destiny are active amid nuanced, possibly deceptive appearances.

This compiled set of data—including planetary positions, house placements, major aspects, and recognized patterns—constitutes the core factual information for further horary interpretation of your question.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based solely on the horary chart, your message this morning carries contrasting energies that both advance and complicate the union with Stefan.

1. Mercury (significator for your communication) in Aquarius resides in the 2nd house and forms a supportive trine with Jupiter (Stefan’s significator via the cross‐reference), suggesting that your message has an inherently positive quality – it activates a momentum and may stir forward the energies of connection. This aspect indicates that your words have the power to initiate progress and boost the frequency of interaction.

2. However, the chart also presents a notable T-square involving Mars in Cancer (located in the 7th house), the MC (10th house), and the IC (4th house), with Chiron closely tied into the formation via his square with Mars. This configuration points to underlying tensions or possible emotional wounds—the very factors that can hinder a smooth union. Mars square Chiron, with an orb of zero, emphasizes a raw, painful conflict or miscommunication that could slow the pace of events you desire.

3. The multiple square pattern involving Neptune (square the Ascendant) and other key planets further signifies a degree of ambiguity and potential for misinterpretation—energies that can delay clear, decisive progress despite the initial favorable conditions provided by Mercury’s communication.

4. A supportive Grand Trine is present among the Sun, Mercury, Jupiter, and the Midheaven, reinforcing synchronous communication and ideological alignment. This pattern suggests that if you navigate the complications indicated by the T-square carefully, there is a natural flow of destiny at work.

5. The lunar phase, being a waxing crescent, underscores the beginning of an active phase and new initiatives in your life. It is a sign of emerging potential but not an immediate maturity of the union.

Based solely on these facts, the interpretation is as follows: Your message is likely to accelerate the dynamics of your connection with Stefan by igniting a channel of communication and setting intentions in motion. However, latent tensions—with a potential for emotional hurt and conflicting influences—will moderate this acceleration. The union may be set in a state of dynamic flux, where progress is stimulated by your clear conveyance of intent, yet the fated culmination might be delayed due to the unresolved complexities highlighted in the chart.

The indication is that your communication carries significant power to move things along, but the timing and depth of the union will ultimately depend on overcoming these internal and external challenges.
